schools.name: Univ Of Illinois Coll Of Med-Chicago

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Lee listened to my issues, provided me with helpful information and was patient and empathetic.

Absolutely!  Dr. Lee always provides stellar services!  She is very patient and answers every question I have with care and concern.  I love how she stays on top of my care and her goal is to keep me informed and more importantly, to keep me healthy.
On my first visit with Dr. Lee, she was very informative on providing me with information pertaining to my health.

Dr. Lee seemed disinterested and very disnissive. She was very hard to talk to. I felt she was not listening to me.
Her follow up was brief and left me with more questions then answers

Dr. Lee is great. She listened to my concerns and quickly provided comments without being dismissive. She was also communicative as to her concerns. She ordered tests and kept me posted while results were coming in, and quickly followed up with me once she had them all.

Dr. Lee is a good listener and diagnostician. Arthritis is a long-game strategy and it takes time to figure out the right med per individual. Dr. Lee is patient and thorough and I feel very comfortable continuing treatment with her towards this end.
Very thorough, really took the time to listen and understand my personal concerns. Didn't feel rushed in the appointment at all, felt very taken care of and that I was in good hands.
She is very thorough and knowledgeable and does not just prescribe medication she looks at the whole picture and analyzes from there.

schools.name: Yale Univ Sch Of Med -New Haven

reviewDetails.comment: She is excellent
Her examination was very thorough very polite and has lots of patience answers all your questions. I will recommend her to anyone.
A consistently exceptional experience. Very short wait times. Professional team, engaging, thorough. Dr. Park explains tests and procedures as well as outcomes and evaluations.
Dr. Park was incredibly thorough, patient, and approachable.  She took time to answer all my questions and made sure all my concerns were addressed.  I'd definitely recommend her to others.

Dr. Park was very personal and caring.  She was very thorough throughout.  And she was very empathetic to the concerns/complaints I was sharing.  The symptoms could be nothing to doctor's point of view however, it feels good as a patient that you are being heard no matter what.

reviewDetails.comment: She was very easy to talk to and listened to the history of my illness before jumping to a conclusion or dimissing the problem like some physicians do.  She gave me the medication that eventually made me get well, and gave me other tips to help me feel better.
My visit with Dr. Grover was great. She listened to me and understood my concerns. She is very approachable, patient and caring. I highly recommend Dr. Grover!
Accommodating and professional, friendly and easy to talked with
Friendly...listen, smile, eye contact

reviewDetails.comment: Excellent- prompt, great customer service and medical health professionals are super kind, informative and knowledgable.
Dr. McBride is very friendly & careing.

The doctor herself is very nice. However, the staff is very incompetent. Before every visit I had to give them at least 3-4 calls to remind them that they need to send a vaccine for me to a pharmacy  and they still forgot (the point of the appointment was to receive a vaccine).

reviewDetails.comment: I have been going to Dr. Haber for 25 years since he did my biopsy back then for Dr. Davies.  Someone else in another facility did a "botched biopsy" prior.  He is an excellent doctor and very careful and skilled with his biopsies.
Very knowledgeable. Takes the time to listen to patients

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Rosales, lives up to her reviews. She listened and was able to talk pragmatically about my concerns. Very happy with my visit.
Knows what she’s talking about, explain everything and the procedure and causes of sickness
Dr. Rosales takes great notes, makes sure you feel comfortable, has a great energy, and is always willing to answer questions about your health and results in full if you ask!
Doctor Rosales was wonderful. Very straightforward and kind.
She did her best to understand my anxiety and gave a kind and easy explanation.

Dr. Rosales is friendly, a great listener, and always displays a thoughtful caring attitude to all my medical concerns.  She makes you feel comfortable, is efficient and always follows up with excellent medical care and advice.
She is very kindness.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Galichon listen's carefully to what you are saying and provides the care necessary to make you feel better.  She also advocates preventive care and makes recommendations and/or provides the means to achieve keeping up with your health needs.

I have found Dr. Galichon to be direct and professional. I think that her bedside manner and interpersonal communication skills are immaculate. I dread doctor appointments, but she makes the experience pleasant and comfortable.

I visited the office because I had been sick for several days. My doctor was not available for a day of appointment so I scheduled with Dr. Galichon.  She came in briefly, did a flu test and never returned.  the nurse came back stood at the door and said they will give you a print our at the receptionist desk.  There was no followup with the doctor to tell me what was going on with me nor from the nurse.  and on the print out basically told me to loose weight.  I went in because I was sick not because I was having weight related issues.

My visits are too matter of fact, she seems too impersonal. I am use to my immediate physician to show some concern for my well being. Dr. Galichon seems not to be interested in  what is physically wrong. She seems to be just interested in getting you in and out. Perhaps other doctors in the network are different.
Dr. Galichon is always pleasant and compassionate.  She listens without predetermination, focus on person centered care.
Friendly and thorough. Wait was longer than expected, but kindness made up for it.
